name: TEST - SOTA 2026 - WF5 Standard RAG V3.4 - CORRECTED

parameters.query:
SELECT id, content, source, 
       ts_rank(to_tsvector('french', content), plainto_tsquery('french', $1)) as bm25_score
FROM documents 
WHERE is_obsolete = false 
  AND tenant_id = $2
  AND to_tsvector('french', content) @@ plainto_tsquery('french', $1)
ORDER BY bm25_score DESC LIMIT 20

options.queryReplacement: =={{ $node['Init & ACL Pre-Filter V3.4'].json.query }},{{ $node['Init & ACL Pre-Filter V3.4'].json.user_context.tenant_id }}

parameters.content:
# 🔧 VARIABLES D'ENVIRONNEMENT REQUISES (SOTA 2026)

## LLM APIs
- `OPENROUTER_BASE_URL` - https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/chat/completions
- `LLM_HYDE_MODEL` - meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct:free
- `LLM_FAST_MODEL` - meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct:free

## Embedding
- `EMBEDDING_API_URL` - URL embedding API
- `EMBEDDING_MODEL` - text-embedding-3-small

## Reranking
- `RERANKER_API_URL` - https://api.cohere.ai/v1/rerank
- `RERANKER_MODEL` - rerank-v3.5 (upgraded from rerank-multilingual-v3.0)

## CORRECTIONS V3.4.1:
- Fixed HyDE Generator JSON body (removed orphan JS code)
- Fixed Embedding model string (removed extra quotes)
- Fixed Query Decomposer model reference

## ISSUE-SR-04 (P1) - PENDING ARCHITECTURE CHANGE:
- An IF node must be added BEFORE the Cohere Reranker node
- Condition: skip_reranker === true → bypass Cohere entirely
- Currently when skip_reranker=true, a placeholder document is sent to Cohere
- This wastes API credits and may produce misleading rerank scores
- Route: RRF → [new IF: Has Results?] → true: Cohere → Rerank Merger
-                                      → false: Rerank Merger (directly)
- STATUS: Requires manual structural change (add node + rewire connections)

parameters.query:
SELECT id, content, source, 
       ts_rank(to_tsvector('french', content), plainto_tsquery('french', $1)) as bm25_score
FROM documents 
WHERE is_obsolete = false 
  AND tenant_id = $2
  AND to_tsvector('french', content) @@ plainto_tsquery('french', $1)
ORDER BY bm25_score DESC LIMIT 20

options.queryReplacement: =={{ $node['Init & ACL Pre-Filter V3.4'].json.query }},{{ $node['Init & ACL Pre-Filter V3.4'].json.user_context.tenant_id }}

parameters.content:
# 🔧 VARIABLES D'ENVIRONNEMENT REQUISES (SOTA 2026)

## LLM APIs
- `OPENROUTER_BASE_URL` - https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/chat/completions
- `LLM_HYDE_MODEL` - meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct:free
- `LLM_FAST_MODEL` - meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct:free

## Embedding
- `EMBEDDING_API_URL` - URL embedding API
- `EMBEDDING_MODEL` - text-embedding-3-small

## Reranking
- `RERANKER_API_URL` - https://api.cohere.ai/v1/rerank
- `RERANKER_MODEL` - rerank-v3.5 (upgraded from rerank-multilingual-v3.0)

## CORRECTIONS V3.4.1:
- Fixed HyDE Generator JSON body (removed orphan JS code)
- Fixed Embedding model string (removed extra quotes)
- Fixed Query Decomposer model reference

## ISSUE-SR-04 (P1) - PENDING ARCHITECTURE CHANGE:
- An IF node must be added BEFORE the Cohere Reranker node
- Condition: skip_reranker === true → bypass Cohere entirely
- Currently when skip_reranker=true, a placeholder document is sent to Cohere
- This wastes API credits and may produce misleading rerank scores
- Route: RRF → [new IF: Has Results?] → true: Cohere → Rerank Merger
-                                      → false: Rerank Merger (directly)
- STATUS: Requires manual structural change (add node + rewire connections)
